snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel met with Turkey’s prime minister and pledged that the European Union would continue to pursue talks “in good faith” over Turkey’s accession to the bloc.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel meets with Turkish Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan, and pledges European Union will continue to pursue talks over Turkey's accession to bloc, despite disagreements that have proved challenging for both sides; pledge comes after warning by Erdogan that European Union is in danger of losing Turkey if it is not granted membership by 2023.

byline.original: By MELISSA EDDY and CHRIS COTTRELL

lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel met with Turkey’s prime minister and pledged that the European Union would continue to pursue talks “in good faith” over Turkey’s accession to the bloc.
